div.p: The National Center for Ecological Analysis and Synthesis at UC Santa Barbara provided invaluable infrastructural support for this research, and Juan Mayorga helped process the latest fishing layers. Support was provided by the Gordon and Betty Moore Foundation and Conservation International, FM acknowledges the support of NSF OCE-1737090. All stressor, ecosystem, impact and cumulative impact data are available at 10.5063/F12B8WBS and all code are at https://github.com/OHI-Science/impact_acceleration.
